data.message: Create enforcement eval runner with CI workflow: enforcement_runner.py feeds fake tool calls into hook, asserts correct BLOCK/WARN/ALLOW. 35/35 tests passing across 6 enforcement categories (destructive commands, secrets in git, force push, path sandbox, read-before-edit, amend protection). GitHub Actions workflow runs daily + on PR. Commits: .agent 9d0403f, .claude f373933.
